methodology: Enterprise-grade usability testing with competitive edge focus
findings: 📱 TOUCH UX: 1 buttons below minimum 44px touch target (usability violation)
🐛 JS CONSOLE: 24 severe JavaScript errors affecting UX reliability
📊 CHART UX: Charts lack interactive tooltips - poor data exploration experience
📊 CHART ACCESSIBILITY: Charts missing aria-labels for screen reader users
🧭 NAVIGATION: No clear current page indication - users lose context
🧭 SEARCH UX: No search functionality in data-heavy dashboard
competitive_advantage: Deep accessibility, mobile UX, and enterprise usability analysis
